name: Cosmic Alliance General Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Reduce all damage by 50%.Steals all beneficial effects, including Golden Effects, from a random enemy at the start of your turn and the target can no longer gain beneficial effects until they die
Gain immunity to all Silence and Ability Disabling effects, (not including Passive Disable)
Grant immunity to Perfect Corruption and effects that prevent gaining beneficial effects to all allies
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Alliance General character.
